article.Heading: Cabinet likely to take up new scheme for area-based exemptions under GST: Sources
article.Summary: CNBC-TV18 learn from sources that the cabinet is likely to take up new scheme for area-based exemptions under goods and services tax (GST) today.
article.Body:
CNBC-TV18 learn from sources that the cabinet is likely to take up new scheme for area-based exemptions under goods and services tax (GST) today.

Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18â€™s Sapna Das for more details.
